attributes.action: bring back the ding dong to Doncaster Railway Station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We miss a lot of things about how life used to be. 2p on the bus, petrol costing less than a pound (a gallon!), but the one thing we feel that is missing more than anything from today's modern world is the ding dong from the PA system at Doncaster!

More seriously, people listen for a chime at the beginning of their announcement and therefore will listen to the message. At present this does not happen (not just at Doncaster, at an increasing number of stations) and this would not have happened with a ding dong.

So please support our petition for the reinstatement of the Doncaster ding dong!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
